Title: Corrigendum for development of Abraham model correlations for solute transfer into 2-methoxyethanol from water and from the gas phase at 298 K [J. Mol. Liq. (2015), 209, 738–744] (S0167732215301100) (10.1016/j.molliq.2015.05.037))
Abstract: © 2017 Elsevier B.V.The mole fraction solubility of trans-stilbene in 2-methoxyethanol was inadvertently given in Table 1 as XS,organicexp = 0.1442. The correct value is XS,organicexp = 0.01442.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
